TITLE: Gluten Free Restuarant Card
LINE1: Ndine chirwere chinonzi Celiac Disease uye ndinofanira kutevera kudya kwakakwana kwe gluten.
LINE2: Saka ndinogona kurwara zvikuru kana ndichidya zvokudya zvine ruzivo kana zviyo zvegorosi, rye, bhari uye oats.
LINE3: Zvokudya izvi zvine upfu kana zviyo zvegorosi, rye, bhari kana oats here? Kana iwe zvachose usina chokwadi nezvezvokudya izvozvi, ndapota ndiudze.
LINE4: Ndinogona kudya zvokudya zvine rizi, chibage, mbatatisi, marudzi ose emidziyo uye michero, mazai, chezi, mukaka, nyama nehove - chero bedzi dzisina kubikwa neupfu hwegorosi, batter, breadcrumbs kana sauce.
